sql.query:
INSERT INTO absences
(enrolment_uuid, absence_date, makeup_eligible, uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{enroluuid}} */, :P2 /* {{absence_date.toTimestamp()}} */, :P3 /* {{(makeup_eligible === true || makeup_eligible === 'true') ? 1 : 0}} */, :P4 /* {{absence_uuid_gen}} */)

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'makeup_tokens_enabled'

INSERT INTO makeup_tokens
(absence_uuid, enrolment_uuid, student_uuid, uuid, created_date, created_by) VALUES (:P1 /* {{absence_uuid_gen}} */, :P2 /* {{enroluuid}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.student_uuid}} */, :P4 /* {{makeup_token_uuid}} */, :P5 /* {{TIMESTAMP}} */, :P6 /* {{identity}} */)

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'makeup_tokens_expiry_enabled'

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'makeup_tokens_expiry_length'

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'makeup_tokens_expiry_from_classdate'

UPDATE makeup_tokens
SET expiry_date = :P1 /* {{absence_date.dateAdd('days', query_makeup_expiry_length.value.toNumber()).toTimestamp()}} */
WHERE uuid = :P2 /* {{makeup_token_uuid}} */

UPDATE makeup_tokens
SET expiry_date = :P1 /* {{NOW_UTC.dateAdd('days', query_makeup_expiry_length.value.toNumber()).toTimestamp()}} */
WHERE uuid = :P2 /* {{makeup_token_uuid}} */

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'holding_fees_enabled'

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'holding_fees_type'

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'holding_fees_value'

SELECT ec.uuid AS enrolcharge_uuid, fc.uuid AS familycharge_uuid, ec.enrolsubtotal
FROM charges_enrolments AS ec
LEFT JOIN charges_family AS fc ON (fc.uuid = ec.charge_uuid)
WHERE ec.classDate = :P1 /* {{absence_date.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}} */ AND ec.enrolment_uuid = :P2 /* {{enroluuid}} */

INSERT INTO holding_fees
(uuid, enrolment_uuid, student_uuid, holding_fee, holding_fee_type, status, absence_date, absence_uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{'hf_'+UUID.replace('-', '')}} */, :P2 /* {{enroluuid}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.student_uuid}} */, :P4 /* {{query_hf_value.value}} */, :P5 /* {{query_hf_type.value}} */, '1', :P6 /* {{absence_date.toTimestamp()}} */, :P7 /* {{absence_uuid_gen}} */)

options.data: Could not continue. Holding Fees are not enabled in your settings.
